Query for searching coordinates in polygon.

select astext(location) 
from dummy 
where contains(GeomFromText('polygon((46.77096634956555 23.59688186632411, 46.76937908130689 23.59962844835536, 46.766880508727354 23.596538543570205, 46.766880508727354 23.596538543570205, 46.77096634956555 23.59688186632411))'), location);

select astext(location) 
from dummy 
where contains(GeomFromText('polygon((46.7814406574017 23.62236976638087, 46.7812055552348 23.594474792625988, 46.76280562741452 23.591556549217785, 46.76162969950427 23.620052337792004, 46.7814406574017 23.62236976638087))'), location);

select lat, lon  
from entries  
where contains(GeomFromText('polygon((46.7814406574017 23.62236976638087, 46.7812055552348 23.594474792625988, 46.76280562741452 23.591556549217785, 46.76162969950427 23.620052337792004, 46.7814406574017 23.62236976638087))'), GeomFromText(concat('point(', lat, ' ', lon, ')')));

select count(distinct car_qnr), count(trip_id), round(avg(speed), 2), min(rate), max(rate), trip_id 
from `entries`  
where contains(GeomFromText('polygon((46.798340833119134 23.649959564208984, 46.786823236292825 23.678112030029297, 46.78329694857407 23.70351791381836, 46.779535320405095 23.738536834716797, 46.804686210739916 23.730640411376953, 46.80915102785959 23.68978500366211, 46.798340833119134 23.649959564208984))'), GeomFromText(concat('point(', lat, ' ', lon, ')')));

select car_qnr, count(trip_id), round(avg(speed), 2), min(rate), max(rate), lat, lon, trip_id 
from `entries`  
where contains(GeomFromText('polygon((46.798340833119134 23.649959564208984, 46.786823236292825 23.678112030029297, 46.78329694857407 23.70351791381836, 46.779535320405095 23.738536834716797, 46.804686210739916 23.730640411376953, 46.80915102785959 23.68978500366211, 46.798340833119134 23.649959564208984))'), GeomFromText(concat('point(', lat, ' ', lon, ')'))) 
group by car_qnr;
